excerpt: TMC-UPS-2A24V-(A)-EVAL / TMC-UPS-10A70V-(A)-EVAL is a universal Power Stage.It drives up to 2A / 10A of current and is tolerant to supply voltages up to 24V / 70V. It uses half bridge gate drivers and discrete MOSFETs as well as standard connectors for supply and motor connection. Current measurement is implemented by inline shunt amplifiers.The Power Stages TMC-UPS-2A24V-A-EVAL and TMC-UPS-10A70V-A-EVAL (5V supply for shunt amplifiers) are optimized for usage with TMC4671-EVAL.The Power Stages TMC-UPS-2A24V-EVAL and TMC-UPS-10A70V-EVAL (3.3V supply for shunt amplifiers) are optimized for usage with TMC8670-EVAL.
